text: Whistler Creekside is one of four neighborhoods in Whistler, British Columbia, Canada. The 2010 Winter Paralympics para-alpine skiing races were at Whistler Creekside. The types of races at Whistler included downhill, Super-Combined, Super-G, slalom and giant slalom. == Photographs == File:Blackcomb Mountain-2007.jpg File:Blackcomb 1.jpg File:Whistler Mountain 1.jpg File:Whistler Mountain 3.jpg File:Whistler Panorama -2007.jpg File:BlackcombWizardExpressLift.jpg File:Jersey Cream Whistler BC Canada.JPG File:Whistler_Peak_Panorama.jpg == References == Category:Ski areas and resorts in Canada Category:Settlements in British Columbia
title: Whistler Creekside
